creator: tgromek@qwest.com
text:
How or what do I need to modify in order for a web portal to access my Clear 
express website (on apache) so that it opens up in the same web window.  
Currently it opens up a separate web browser.  I want it to open the site 
within the same browser window.  Any help would be appreciated thanks.

creator: erik@codefaktor.de
text:
This is clearly not an issue with Apache and to be double clear, Bugzilla is also not a user support 
forum. So, please address your problem in an appropriate forum (perhaps HTML-/JavaScript-
related?). Anyway, thanks for using Apache ;-)
